New Records: Before Pittsburgh blew that lead, teams with a 7+ run lead entering the seventh inning were 1,192-0.
Key Match Events: Christian Bethancourt hit a home run in the seventh inning.
Bethancourt hit a two-run double in the eighth inning.
Ian Happ hit an RBI single in the eighth inning.
Bethancourt hit a two-run single in the ninth inning.
Mike Tauchman and Seiya Suzuki hit RBI singles in the ninth inning.
Pre-Game Insights: The Cubs were looking to force themselves back into the playoff picture.
The Cubs faced rookie phenom Paul Skenes, who was the NL starting pitcher in the 2024 MLB All-Star Game.
Post-Match Reflections: The victory could be a season-defining moment for the Cubs.
If the Cubs make it to the postseason, this win might be seen as a turning point.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs turned a 10-3 deficit into a 14-10 victory.
The Cubs extended their winning streak to three games.
